Summary I am an accomplished international technical pre-sales professional living in London. 
 
I am originally from Lisbon where I was awarded a degree in Electrical and Computers Engineering. I started my career delivering IT solutions internationally for Sonae Sierra where I established myself as a team leader and designed, planned and delivered projects worth in excess of £1M in Brazil, Spain, Germany, Italy, Portugal and Greece.  
 
I have held senior positions in a numbers of innovative start-ups in London, including my own company (modu), which gave me an appreciation of the entire product lifecycle from conception to sales and delivery. During my time at modu I managed client relationships with TalkTalk, GOSH, Wella and others. I maintain a non-executive role in this business. 
 
Most recently I worked for Nativ where I pitched, designed and sold innovative digital solutions to brands like ITV, Audi, Bentley, DG, Vubiquity, Whitbread, TAG, Clifford Chance, TV2 and others, equalling 67% of total sales in the last 18 months. 
 
Over the past 11 year I developed a unique set of skills and maintain a global professional network. 
Based in my experience I understand how to enable clients to deliver their roadmaps through digital innovation and process re-engineering. I do this by agreeing relevant KPIs and achievable goals and measuring and reporting against them. 
 
Specialties: Business Analysis, Technical Pre-Sales, Digital Video, Solutions, Industry Insight, Web Platforms, Product Development, Team Leadership, IT Infrastructures
